title: Kaguya – Tsuki no Usagi no Gin no Hakobune - Novel Updates
author: Hajime Kamoshida
description:
The one who had the useless ability to “let others see what he was seeing,” was Sanada Souta.

Living on while keeping this ability a secret, one day Souta encountered a strange girl in front of his apartment complex. She was bare and wrapped in a sheet, and it also seemed she couldn’t see…The strange girl, Tachibana Hinata began living with Souta, and it seemed she had a special power as well…It’s the birth of a wonderous Heroine and Love Story.>
